channel.title: Let's go for the OPPISITE OF THE SORC AND INQUISTOR COUNTER
channel.description:
The Protector (Neutral Killing)
Passive 1:Strong Defender-Immune to death at night from anything except the Destroyer. Implies bleeding ect.
Passive 2-Forever Alertful-Immune to occupation and redirection.
Night ability 1-Defend-Knights sacrifice expect you don't die from it. (Cool down of 1 night)
Night ability 2-Coldsteel-Coldsteel someone, if they are a BD this goes on a cool down for two nights.
Goal:Live to see the BD WIn
Ironic as a neutral killer.
The Destroyer (Neutral Support)
Passive 1-Destruction-Immune to death and occupation and redirection. Passive 2-Know who the evils are and talk to them at night.
Day ability-Get out of my way-Your ability will kill anyone tonight. Does not bypass immunity ect.
Night ability 1-Seek The Good-Determine if a person is a defender of good. (Determines if a person is A physician ,Defender, Court wizard, or a Alch) infinite uses
Night ability 2-Destroy the good-Kill a person if they are a defender of good. (Infinite uses if they aren't a defender goes on a cool down of one night)
Goal:Live to see Unseen/Cult win! OPPISITE of sorc?

item.title: Let's go for the OPPISITE OF THE SORC AND INQUISTOR COUNTER
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Firelitten:

Passive 2-Know who the evils are and talk to them at night.

They should not have this passive, it gives the Unseen at least ( not including merc on an Unseen member or a fool or scorned or alch) 4 votes as maximum capacity and the cult at 5. Will take the deducing and skill out of the game,

defender of good.

item.source: Let's go for the OPPISITE OF THE SORC AND INQUISTOR COUNTER

item.title: Let's go for the OPPISITE OF THE SORC AND INQUISTOR COUNTER
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Firelitten:

Day ability-Get out of my way-Your ability will kill anyone tonight. Does not bypass immunity ect.

This is a killing Ability with infinite uses (I assume) in a support class.

Firelitten:

Night ability 1-Seek The Good-Determine if a person is a defender of good. (Determines if a person is A physician ,Defender, Court wizard, or a Alch) infinite uses

This is an investigative ability in a support class.

Firelitten:

Night ability 2-Destroy the good-Kill a person if they are a defender of good. (Infinite uses if they aren’t a defender goes on a cool down of one night)

A killer ability. This class has 0 support abilites therfore it should not be a support class. It should be a killer class or even an investigative class (this is a stretch though).

Read full topic
item.source: Let's go for the OPPISITE OF THE SORC AND INQUISTOR COUNTER

item.title: Let's go for the OPPISITE OF THE SORC AND INQUISTOR COUNTER
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
The Protector (Neutral Killing)

Passive 1:Strong Defender-Immune to death at night from anything except the Destroyer. Implies bleeding ect.

Passive 2-Forever Alertful-Immune to occupation and redirection.

Night ability 1-Defend-Knights sacrifice expect you don’t die from it. (Cool down of 1 night)

Night ability 2-Coldsteel-Coldsteel someone, if they are a BD this goes on a cool down for two nights.

Goal:Live to see the BD WIn

Ironic as a neutral killer.

The Destroyer (Neutral Support)

Passive 1-Destruction-Immune to death and occupation and redirection.
Passive 2-Know who the evils are and talk to them at night.

Day ability-Get out of my way-Your ability will kill anyone tonight. Does not bypass immunity ect.

Night ability 1-Seek The Good-Determine if a person is a defender of good. (Determines if a person is A physician ,Defender, Court wizard, or a Alch) infinite uses

Night ability 2-Destroy the good-Kill a person if they are a defender of good. (Infinite uses if they aren’t a defender goes on a cool down of one night)

Goal:Live to see Unseen/Cult win!
OPPISITE of sorc?
